attributes.action: stop the introduction of Court Hearing Fees and to abolish the principle of making County Courts self financing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Department for Constitutional Affairs (DCA) introduced a Consultation Document on 2 April 2007 proposing new County Court Hearing Fees. This is part of the principle of making County Courts self financing. It is just one of a number of measures which will prevent ordinary people from having access to County Courts. County Court funding should not be dependent on revenue raised from Court fees. Access to the Civil Courts should be a citizen's right in a civilised society.
